text: Walk This Way is a hit debut studio album released in April 2008 by the alternative rock band The White Tie Affair. The album contains singles like "Candle (Sick & Tired)", "Allow Me to Introduce Myself... Mr. Right", and "Take It Home". ==Singles== * 2008 - Candle (Sick & Tired) * 2008 - Allow Me to Introduce Myself... Mr. Right * 2009 - Take It Home ==Track Listing== # "Allow Me to Introduce Myself... Mr. Right" # "The Letdown" # "Candle (Sick & Tired)" # "Scene Change" # "Watching You" # "The Enemy" # "Take It Home" # "Price of Company" # "If I Fall" # "The Way Down" Category:2008 albums
title: Walk This Way (album)
